Package arc.audio

Class Audio

java.lang.Object
arc.audio.Audio
All Implemented Interfaces:
Disposable
Direct Known Subclasses:
MockAudio
public class Audio
extends java.lang.Object
implements Disposable
High-level wrapper for the Soloud library.

      protected void initialize()
